title: PM under fire over No 10 lockdown Christmas parties
content: Boris Johnson says all Covid guidance was followed after reports of parties last year in Downing Street.

title: PM under fire over No 10 lockdown Christmas parties
content: Boris Johnson says all Covid guidance was followed after reports of parties last year in Downing Street.

title: Pre-travel Covid tests would be valuable - scientists
content: Labour has called for the reintroduction of pre-departure tests for travellers bound for the UK.

title: Rees-Mogg investigated by standards watchdog
content: The Commons leader denies breaking the rules over £6m in loans from one of his own companies.

title: Help for home changes pledged in social care plan
content: Ministers say how they want to spend extra money - but are accused of failing to fix immediate problems.

title: What's happened to the 40 new hospitals pledge?
content: The Conservatives' 2019 manifesto promised 40 new hospitals across England - are they delivering on this?

title: Turning back boats will increase danger, MPs warn
content: Home Secretary Priti Patel is urged to ditch plans to push back migrants trying to cross the Channel.

title: Family spending predicted to rise £1,700 a year
content: Monthly spend over Christmas expected to increase by £109, according to projections for BBC Panorama.
